```{r setup}
library(monitoR)
pacman::p_load(conflicted, tidyverse)
```

# Data
```{r}
data(skink)
```

```{r}
skink |> glimpse()
```

# Processing
First we add a 4x4 grid

```{r}
grid <- create_grid(range(skink$X), range(skink$Y), dim = c(4,4))
skink_grid <- skink |> add_grid(grid)
```


```{r}
plot_grid(grid, skink_grid)
```
